code: import{useContext}from"react";import{CartContext}from"../Contexts/CartContext";import'../Cart/Cart.css';import TrashCan from'../Icons/trash-solid.svg';import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CartPage=function CartPage(){var _useContext=useContext(CartContext),myCart=_useContext.myCart,total=_useContext.total,addtoCart=_useContext.addtoCart,setTotal=_useContext.setTotal;var navigate=useNavigate();var handleCheckout=function handleCheckout(){setTotal(0);addtoCart([{}]);};var handlePayment=function handlePayment(){navigate("/payment");};var handleRemoveItem=function handleRemoveItem(deletedItem){var currentItem=myCart;currentItem=myCart.filter(function(item){return item.id!==deletedItem.id;});addtoCart(currentItem);setTotal(total-deletedItem.price);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"cart-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-items",children:[myCart.slice(1).map(function(item){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.imageUrl,alt:""}),item.name," : ",item.price,"$",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"trash",src:TrashCan,onClick:function onClick(){return handleRemoveItem(item);}})]});}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-total",children:["Total: ",total,"$"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"cart-payment",onClick:handlePayment,children:" Check-out"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"cart-checkout",onClick:handleCheckout,children:" Clear"})]})})})});};export default CartPage;
